sourcesContent:
<template>
    <CoundDownEffect v-if="show_countdown === 'yes'"/>
    <PlayGround v-if="$store.state.pk.status === 'Playing' && show_countdown === 'no'"></PlayGround>
    <MatchGround v-if="$store.state.pk.status === 'Matching' && show_countdown === 'no'"></MatchGround>
</template>


<script>
import PlayGround from "@/components/PlayGround.vue"
import MatchGround from "@/components/MatchGround.vue"
import CoundDownEffect from "@/components/CoundDownEffect.vue";
import { onMounted, onUnmounted , ref} from "vue"
import { useStore } from "vuex";
import CoundDownEffect from "@/components/CoundDownEffect.vue";

export default {
    components: {
    PlayGround,
    MatchGround,
    CoundDownEffect
},
    setup() {
        const store = useStore();
        const socketUrl = `ws://localhost:8888/websocket/${store.state.user.token}`;
        let show_countdown = ref("no")

        let socket = null;
        onMounted(() => {
            store.commit("updateOpponent", {
                username: '???',
                photo : "https://cdn.acwing.com/media/article/image/2022/08/09/1_1db2488f17-anonymous.png"
            })
            socket = new WebSocket(socketUrl);

            socket.onopen = () => {
                console.log("Connected");
                store.commit("updateSocket", socket)
            }

            socket.onmessage = msg => {
                const data = JSON.parse(msg.data);
                if (data.event === "start-matching") { // maching success
                    store.commit("updateOpponent", {
                        username: data.opponent_username,
                        photo: data.opponent_photo,
                    });
                    show_countdown.value = 'yes'
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        store.commit("updateStatus", "Playing"), 2000
                    })
                    show_countdown.value = 'no';
                    store.commit("updateGameMap", data.game_map)
                }
                console.log(data);
            }

            socket.onclose = () => {
                console.log("Connection closed");
            }

        });

        onUnmounted(() => {
            socket.close();
        })

        return {
            show_countdown
        }
    }

}
</script>


<style scoped>
</style>
